goals__remit:
Key Factors of your Organization: 
 
-Representation of a single political system 
-fighting against discrimination 
-helping integration  
-culture and social involvement 
-economic policy engagement 
-education 
-health 
-mobilized health and care 
-active family assistance 
-establishing rehabilitation center 
-fighting against alcoholism  
-developing healthy environment and lifestyle 
-fighting for housing rights 
-creating new jobs 
-espousing import, export, and investment opportunities 
-investment in micro, small and large enterprises 
-supporting farming 
-revitalizing traditional professions 
-support sport activities  
-Romani Kris Laws and regulation 
-fighting against police abuse
relevant_communication:
-Engaging with Commissioners, EU civil servants, Members of the European Parliament (MEPs) or their assistants, to represent our position on the current situation affecting the Roma communities within EU countries. Such as but not limited to: 
 
1. antigypsyism 
2. housing 
3. poverty 
4. poor education 
5. wellness and health issues 
 
-Taking part in or EU-run structures such as Expert Groups, Advisory Committees, High Level Groups, European Parliament Intergroups, Committees or forums to discuss our agenda addressing Roma integration within EU countries.  Expanding on our socioeconomic programs which address specific problems with viable solutions to tackle and diminish the current crises.  
 
-Organized events 
 
1. present at an event in March to discuss health 
2. collaborated with EPHA on Roma Health issues at the April 26 event in Brussels   
3. presented at Roma Week on 11th of April  
4. Met with Italian delegates on May 15th to discuss the living conditions and health issues arising from camp living.  
5. Will be hosting an event in Romania before delegates about Roma discrimination and the current Roma deaths happening in the Ukraine and elsewhere.  
 
6.  Will be presenting our organization before the EU in September of 2018. The following has been done for this event: 
 
   forums dealing with EU policies/processes, invitations    
   to which have been sent to Commissioners, MEPs and  
   their assistants or EU officials for out upcoming. 
 
At this event, WRF will be introduced before the parliament as a nonprofit organization and has been granted the forum to discuss our work, social measures, as well as to expand upon our vision for the Roma people and their integration.
